reviewText: An interesting take on the possibility that we exist on the very thin edge between two worlds: what is, and what might have been! An exploration of the life and views of physicist Mark Oliver Everett by his estranged musician son. The Quantum Physics described here don't require math or science expertise, as much of the BBC documentary is focused on the search by the son after his father's death for some understanding of his dad as a man, which leads him to an understanding of why is father was a distant man. An unusual combination of human interest and science.
